review: It works as advertise wifi disconected couple times at first but its been working since,app market could be better but over all its pretty good fast.
author: julio

review: So far so good! We purchased the Amazon Fire TV stick to use with our Sling TV subscription (mainly as an inexpensive way to get all of the sports channels). Also, our TV is an older model flat screen TV and the Fire stick works perfectly with it. Highly recommended!
author: Charity

review: Love this Fire Stick, Very easy set up, quick to learn. Love all the app options!
author: Stephanie Duncan "stephanie duncan"

review: I LOVE this Item.  I take it on vacation it works great!
author: Levisa W.

review: I loved my Amazon Fire TV Stick at first, but just they where not up front with pricing on this product.  After enjoying and becoming a fan of many shows, I find that I now have to buy them after the first show or seasons.  If I'd would have known this in advance, I would have saved my money  and just order HBO or upgraded my Satellite provider......VERY, VERY DECEPTIVE!!!!
author: Louisa

review: Streaming is interrupted by a 1-2 second outage frequently, which is quite annoying, especially in dramatic or action scenes
author: James W. Harrell

review: great product amazon is a killer with this product and amazing streaming device
author: Reo Warner
